synopsis.text: Kawai, a disillusioned police officer, is on the brink of quitting her job, seeking a more fulfilling career. But her plans take an unexpected turn with the arrival of the charismatic and accomplished Seiko Fuji as the new head of her station. Fuji's captivating presence and impressive track record as a top detective reignite Kawai's waning passion for law enforcement. As she finds herself drawn to Fuji, both professionally and personally, Kawai begins to question her decision to resign. With Fuji's influence, Kawai embarks on a journey to rediscover her love for policing while unraveling the enigma behind Fuji's sudden transfer to their ordinary police box.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
